So when a grievously wounded demon, a shemhazian known as Gratheyr, fled into its waters to escape from his enemies, every starving creature swarmed at the smell of blood. As the creatures devoured his flesh, they were corrupted by his Abyssal blood, and their hunger only grew. They feasted until nothing but his heart remained, still beating at the center of the swarm, binding it to a single will. With its meal finished, the bloated swarm left the swamp in search of its next prey. It moved aimlessly, hunting animals and travelers alike, until a great rumble beneath the earth attracted its attention. The Bloodstorm followed the vibrations deep underground, toward the scent of sweat and the sounds of voices.

Swarmsense (Imprecise) 100 feet.name: 集群感官（模糊）100 尺
Swarmsense (Imprecise) 100 feet.description: 蚊女巫可以从附近的昆虫处不断接受信息。只要周围有昆虫引导她，她就可以使用触觉作为一种模糊感官，范围为所标注的距离。

Swarmsight (precise) 20 feet.name: 集群视觉（精确）20 尺
Swarmsight (precise) 20 feet.description: 蚊女巫可以感知到其隐秘宿主接触到的一切事物，可以以触觉作为一种精确感官，范围为所标注的距离。

Wild Empathy.name: 野性认同 Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.description: 蚊女巫可以使用交涉技能对节肢动物（昆虫、蜘蛛和类似的无脊椎动物，例如蚊幅）进行[[/act make-an-impression]]和[[/act request]]。大部分节肢动物对蚊女巫的初始态度都是不关心。

Fecund Wounds.name: 伤口孳生 Fecund Wounds
Fecund Wounds.description: 昆虫幼虫会从蚊女巫周围100尺范围内的开放伤口中生长爬出。在此区域内受到流血伤害的生物还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}，持续1轮。

Haunting Gaze.name: 慑人凝视 Haunting Gaze
Haunting Gaze.description: 30尺。当一个生物在灵光范围内结束回合时，必须进行@Check[will|dc:29]豁免。如果检定失败，则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}若其已经陷入惊惧，则惊惧值上升1（最多@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}），并且在其下一回合结束时惊惧值不会下降1。如果在豁免失败之前该生物的惊惧值已为3或更高，则其@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]1轮。

Obscuring Host.name: 隐秘宿主 Obscuring Host
Obscuring Host.description: 20尺。一大群蚊子环绕着蚊女巫，在灵光范围内造成隐蔽。在灵光中开始回合的生物必须通过@Check[fortitude|dc:26]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。蚊女巫和节肢动物可以看穿这片区域，并且免疫其恶心效果。

Dipteric Dread.name: 战栗双翼 Dipteric Dread
Dipteric Dread.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:29]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[2d6[piercing],2d6[poison]]伤害（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[2d6[piercing],3d6[poison]]伤害（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[2d6[piercing],5d6[poison]]伤害

Terror From Within.name: 内生恐惧 Terror From Within
Terror From Within.description: 蚊女巫的力量靠恐惧获得滋养。当一个生物因蚊女巫的噬咬和战栗双翼而受到流血或穿刺伤害时，还要受到2倍于其惊惧值的额外伤害。

Mosquito Witch (The Swarm Seer).name: 蚊女巫-虫群先知 Mosquito Witch (The Swarm Seer)
Mosquito Witch (The Swarm Seer).publicNotes:
蚊女巫外表类似人形，有着令人不舒服的蜡黄皮肤。她似乎总是低着头，耸着肩膀，一头蓬乱的黑发遮住整个脸，只能看见一双一眨不眨的红眼睛和一条又长又尖的舌头，舌头僵硬突出就像个长长的鼻子，背后长着有血肉和骨头的蚊子翅膀。她有六条胳膊，但胳膊上没有长手，而是逐渐变细形成畸形的尖端，像虫蛹的腿一样紧紧抱在胸前。她细长的双腿也逐渐变尖；当她吃饱而肿胀起来之后，就必须用全部八条肢体行走，这八条肢体会在地面上留下小孔一样的足迹。

虫群先知 The Swarm Seer

很少有人见过蚊女巫，但几乎所有人都被与她同名的害虫折磨过。微光滩夏季闪烁的星空伴随的是来自河畔和诸多溪流的蚊虫，以及“害虫飞到哪里，女巫就能看到哪里”的说法。在虫群先知形态下，蚊女巫是一个萦绕不去的捕猎者、一个寄生虫般的窥视者，她有多痴迷于社会关系，吸血的胃口就有多大。她如同社交往来般怀着喜悦关注着每一位居民，痴迷于他们的迷信观念和丢弃的小饰物，尤其是她自己的肖像。

这一形态的蚊女巫很少表现出直接的恶意，或直接对周围造成伤害。然而，她可怕的外表、怪异的观念和通过铺天盖地的虫群表达情感的方式总是会令邻近的人感到恐惧。根据情况不同，她可能会是一个令人畏惧而难以形容的盟友，一个掌管肥沃与富饶的半神，或一个早已对人类失去耐心的可怕敌人。

Baccali Alpaca.publicNotes: A Druman breed of alpaca, the baccali alpaca is prized for its exceptionally soft wool.

Gallop.name: Gallop
Gallop.description: The baccali alpaca Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

Baccali Alpaca.name: Baccali Alpaca

Whalesteed.publicNotes: Whalesteeds were first tamed in the Shackles as part of an ambush between rival pirate captains. Whalesteed riders are still an unusual sight, as learning to master the skill takes years of training.

Deep Breath.name: Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: A whalesteed can hold its breath for 2 hours.

Ramming Speed.name: Ramming Speed
Ramming Speed.description: The whalesteed @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swims} twice and then makes a snout Strike. As long as it moved at least 20 feet, it gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. A Large or smaller creature hit by this attack must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:16] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Aquatic Echolocation.name: Aquatic Echolocation
Aquatic Echolocation.description: A whalesteed can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range, but only underwater.

Whalesteed.name: Whalesteed

Hopping Head.name: 蹦跳头 Hopping Head
Hopping Head.publicNotes: 蹦跳头形似类人生物的头，有时候会有精致的五官，其他时候则只有粗糙的玩具一样的面部。在头的下方是一根弹簧柱，允许蹦跳头自行移动。

Hopping Strike.name: 蹦跳打击 Hopping Strike
Hopping Strike.description: 蹦跳头跳跃15尺，在此次移动中任意一点进行一次弹簧打击，造成额外@Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]]伤害。

Goldsense (Precise) 100 feet.name: 黄金感知 (精确) 120尺
Goldsense (Precise) 100 feet.description: 殃龙可以侦测到120尺内黄金的存在，位置，和大致价值。

Fortune's Favor.name: 财富的宠爱 Fortune's Favor
Fortune's Favor.description:
频率 每日一次

效果 30尺内一个目标生物必须成功通过一次@Check[will|dc:25]豁免，否则将获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dN8QBNuTiaBHCKUe]{恶咒变形术 Cursed Metamorphosis}的效果，被变形成为一头猪，其腰围由目标的财富决定。24小时后，目标可以通过解消动作来结束此效果，此时殃龙会意识到效果结束。殃龙只有在当前没有目标处于此效果时才能使用财富的宠爱。

Money is Pain.name: 钱财即苦痛 Money is Pain
Money is Pain.description:
需求 目标携带价值至少100gp的珍稀金属

效果 殃龙用财富的重量碾碎一个他能看见的生物。与目标财富相近的金币幻化为实体，从四面八方扑向目标。目标尝试一次@Check[will|dc:25]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续1轮。

失败 目标受到@Damage[3d6[persistent,mental]]伤害，且只要伤害持续便陷入缓慢1。如果其携带贵金属价值少于100gp，此效果立即结束。

大失败 同失败，此外移除持续伤害的任何纯骰检定自动失败。

Goldsense (Precise) 120 feet.name: Goldsense (Precise) 120 feet
Goldsense (Precise) 120 feet.description: The yeongno can detect the presence, location, and approximate value of gold within 120 feet.

Yeongno.name: 殃龙 Yeongno
Yeongno.publicNotes:
殃龙既非类人也非魔兽，但又貌似两者，他们曾是天堂的居民，但由于自己的贪婪被放逐至凡间物质宇宙。殃龙声称自己曾是天界龙，他们穿戴着拉长的龙面具，全身裹着有鳞片花纹的外衣以纪念此种说法——尽管无人能证实这种说法的真实性。在他们游荡时，他们嘴里会叼着柳木笛子，发出独特的“哔哔”声，这往往预示着他们的出现。

虽然殃龙的名声如同吃人的怪物，但他们受到穷苦人的欢迎，他们认为这种生物是智慧且正义的。殃龙相信只要吃掉100个滥用财富或通过不正当或剥削手段积累财富的富人，他们就能为自己的贪婪赎罪，让他们能升回天堂。腐败贪婪的人只要捐出自己所有的财富，并同意变成猪一年，就可以摆脱被殃龙吃掉的命运。如果这个人能够忍受一年的变猪生活，并接受曾经被他伤害过的家庭的照顾，永诺就会放过他。
Yeongno.privateNotes:
Glutton's Redemption

Yeongno eat the corrupt and wealthy as a symbolic means of consuming their own greed. While yeongno aspire to ascend from their current existence, they also actively sabotage other creatures hoping to do the same. They feel particularly threatened by imugi, whom the yeongno believe would take their spots in heaven.

Imperfect Automaton.name: 不完美灵导械 Imperfect Automaton

Impassioned Strikes.name: 激情打击 Impassioned Strikes
Impassioned Strikes.description: 当不完美灵导械受到一个情绪效果影响时，它的拳头打击造成额外1d6心灵伤害。

Mortal Reflection.name: 凡胎反思 Mortal Reflection
Mortal Reflection.description:
需求 一个生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]于不完美灵导械

效果 不完美灵导械汲取目标的情感模拟出表面的情绪，它的速度获得+5尺速度加值，持续1分钟。如果受擒或束缚的生物身上有一个持续中的情绪或心灵效果，且反制环级不高于4，不完美灵导械将该效果复制到自己身上，持续1分钟。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.vUFIbQ74jz22rOXw]

Unsubstantiated Consciousness.name: 未经证实的神智 Unsubstantiated Consciousness
Unsubstantiated Consciousness.description: 不完美灵导械在意志豁免中取得成功时视为大成功，取得失败时视为大失败。

Empty Wail.name: 空洞之嚎 Empty Wail
Empty Wail.description:
不完美灵导械发出一声@Template[cone|distance:30]的悲痛嚎叫。嚎叫对范围内所有生物造成@Damage[4d6[mental]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[will|dc:22|options:area-effect,damaging-effect]豁免）。[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Empty Wail]]{1d4轮}内不完美灵导械无法再次使用空洞之嚎。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物承受一半伤害。

失败 生物受到全额伤害，并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续[[/gmr 1d4+1 #rounds]]{1d4+1轮}。

大失败 生物承受双倍伤害，陷入呆滞1（持续1d4+1轮），并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Aigamuxa.name: Aigamuxa

Limited Vision.name: Limited Vision
Limited Vision.description: An aigamuxa's eyes are located on the bottom of their feet, making it difficult for them to see. An aigamuxa is typically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{blind}. If they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, they can see normally until the end of their turn.

Burrowing Concealment.description:
Requirements The aigamuxa is standing on dirt, sand, or another soft surface

Effect The aigamuxa quickly digs into the surface and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hides}. They leave their feet partially exposed, allowing them to see out from the surface. The aigamuxa can hold their breath for up to 10 minutes while hiding in this way.
Burrowing Concealment.name: Burrowing Concealment

Weak Feet.name: Weak Feet
Weak Feet.description: If an aigamuxa takes damage from Striding or Stepping into hazardous terrain or a square with similar grounded hazards (such as caltrops), they can't Seek until the end of their next turn.

Burrowed Ambush.name: Burrowed Ambush
Burrowed Ambush.description:
Requirements The aigamuxa is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hiding} in dirt, sand, or another soft surface

Effect The aigamuxa makes a claw Strike against a creature within reach. On a hit, the aigamuxa automatically Grabs the creature. Whether or not they hit, the aigamuxa then Strides. If they have a creature grabbed, the creature moves with the aigamuxa.

Aigamuxa.publicNotes:
Aigamuxas are towering humanoids that stalk arid deserts in search of prey. Carnivorous and voracious, they hunt anything that moves but especially relish eating sentient creatures. Many Mwangi people incorrectly refer to aigamuxas as demons, while others more accurately describe them as having descended from giants. Aigamuxas resemble large humans with smooth hollows where their eyes should be, but their eyes are actually embedded in the soles of their feet. They sport long, sharp claws and teeth that they use to tear their prey apart once they catch them. A moving aigamuxa's odd gait resembles dancing more than a typical walk or run, but its speed is alarming, if difficult to correctly estimate at a distance.

An aigamuxa's unique physiology makes catching prey difficult, and most aigamuxas are constantly hungry. When pursuing prey, an aigamuxa must occasionally stop to lift its feet in order to regain their bearings. Most stand on their hands while looking around, which allows them to immediately backflip back into a run. An aigamuxa's eyes are generally resistant to the sands of their native desert habitats, but irritants such as chilies or caltrops can seriously impair their hunting ability, and desert travelers often carry a bag of these in case they need to deal with an aigamuxa.

Clever aigamuxas know that attacking wandering prey can be very dangerous, instead using their powerful hands to dig deep into sand dunes or dirt and wait to ambush passersby. Aigamuxas are particularly good at hiding in their home environments, and unfortunate travelers often don't notice the barely visible eyes of an aigamuxa until it's too late.

Jiidon.name: 鼠鬼 Jiidon
Jiidon.publicNotes:
根据鼠鬼的传说，很久很久以前，当魔法还比较狂野，秩序还不那么分明的时候，一只会魔法的老鼠吃掉了一个人类丢弃的指甲，于是神赐予了这只老鼠变形为那个人类的复制的能力。无论真假，鼠鬼都是看似普通的老鼠，它们分享着这个故事的祝福。目前还不清楚第一只鼠鬼是在哪里诞生的，因为它们的后代生活在世界各地的老鼠和类人群体中。在原始形态下，鼠鬼很难与普通老鼠区分开来，它们甚至经常在非智慧亲属的带领下找到一个家。

不过，吃了人形生物丢弃的指甲后，鼠鬼就会变成指甲主人的外貌，在所有明显和外在的方面都与主人相似，但也有一些细微的差别。它们的耳朵稍大，有时会变成一个小点。它们的牙齿一生都在生长，因此必须经常咀嚼石头、树皮和其他坚硬的材料，以锉平牙齿，掩盖它们的真实面目。脸部两侧长出的胡须也需要每天修剪。

鼠鬼大多无害，但它们的力量却让知晓它们的人感到恐慌。母亲们会训斥孩子不要在夜幕降临后剪指甲，以防潜伏的鼠鬼捡走掉落在黑暗中的指甲片。虽然像老鼠一样小心翼翼，但大多数鼠鬼只想变身，在类人社会中占有一席之地。众所周知，为了减少猜疑，它们会把目标对准那些在邻居中不受欢迎的人。当它们取代一个类人时，它们的感激之情有时会在行动中显露出来，揭示目标已被取代的事实，或者让那些不喜欢原身性格的人对鼠鬼产生好感。

来自大家族的鼠鬼通常会寻找一个让他们能够修剪指甲的职业，如清洁工或医生，并通过家族传承类人形态的天赋。

Scurrying Retreat.name: 仓皇撤退 Scurrying Retreat
Scurrying Retreat.description:
触发 鼠鬼受到来自打击的伤害

需求 它当前正变身成类人形态

效果 鼠鬼恢复成鼠形态，并进行攀爬或行走。它在1分钟内不能重新变回类人形态。

Consumed Fragments.name: 吞食指甲 Consumed Fragments
Consumed Fragments.description: 鼠鬼变成其在一周内吃下指甲或类似碎片的中型或更小体型类人生物，获得3环级幻象伪装法术效果，来乔装成该生物，持续8小时；这是个变形效果而非幻术效果。一旦鼠鬼以此方式变身成过某生物，那它必须再次吃下该生物的指甲才能再次变身成后者。如果鼠鬼连续三个晚上吃下某个特定类人生物的指甲，它就能随意变身成该类人生物，但从此以后不能用此能力模仿其他任何类人生物。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 鼠鬼对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成额外1d6精准伤害。

Tactical Gnaw.name: 战术啃咬 Tactical Gnaw
Tactical Gnaw.description: 鼠鬼能用它那几乎坚不可摧的牙齿咬碎哪怕是最坚硬的护甲，让对手变得不堪一击。鼠鬼进行一次颚打击。成功命中时，如果目标穿戴着不高于硬度10的护甲，则护甲变为破损。此次打击不会继续伤害已经破损的护甲。

Jiidon.privateNotes:
Playing a Jiidon

While jiidons don't have ancestral rules in this book, a player interested in creating a jiidon character can use the beastkin versatile heritage to emulate a jiidon who has obtained a permanent humanoid form. The player should work with the GM to determine who the jiidon is imitating and what complications this might have.

Wild Empathy.name: 野性认同 Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.description: 蚊女巫可以使用交涉技能对节肢动物（昆虫、蜘蛛和类似的无脊椎动物，例如蚊幅）进行[[/act make-an-impression]]和[[/act request]]。大部分节肢动物对蚊女巫的初始态度都是不关心。

Haunting Gaze.name: 慑人凝视 Haunting Gaze
Haunting Gaze.description: 30尺。当一个生物在灵光范围内结束回合时，必须进行@Check[will|dc:29]豁免。如果检定失败，则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}若其已经陷入惊惧，则惊惧值上升1（最多@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}），并且在其下一回合结束时惊惧值不会下降1。如果在豁免失败之前该生物的惊惧值已为3或更高，则其@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]1轮。

Prophecy in Red.name: 染红预言 Prophecy in Red
Prophecy in Red.description: 蚊女巫在施放异能法术时必须同时消耗10×法术环级的血液点数。

Swarmsense (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: 集群感官（模糊）30 尺
Swarmsense (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: 蚊女巫可以从附近的昆虫处不断接受信息。只要周围有昆虫引导她，她就可以使用触觉作为一种模糊感官，范围为所标注的距离。

Bloodbelly.name: 储血在腹 Bloodbelly
Bloodbelly.description: 蚊女巫会窃取血液，将其储存起来，为她的预言提供能量。每当蚊女巫造成穿刺伤害时，她都会获得相等数量的血液点数，最多100点。当她储存的血液点数大于等于40时，她陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}；大于等于80时，她陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}。

Dipteric Dread.name: 战栗双翼 Dipteric Dread
Dipteric Dread.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:29]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[2d6[piercing],2d6[poison]]伤害（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[2d6[piercing],3d6[poison]]伤害（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[2d6[piercing],5d6[poison]]伤害

Slurp.name: 啜饮 Slurp
Slurp.description:
触发 一个邻接蚊女巫的生物承受持续流血伤害

效果 蚊女巫吸取该生物的血液，获得等于所造成的流血伤害数量的血液点数。

Terror From Within.name: 内生恐惧 Terror From Within
Terror From Within.description: 蚊女巫的力量靠恐惧获得滋养。当一个生物因蚊女巫的噬咬和战栗双翼而受到流血或穿刺伤害时，还要受到2倍于其惊惧值的额外伤害。

Mosquito Witch (The Hemoprophet).name: 蚊女巫-血先知 Mosquito Witch (The Hemoprophet)
Mosquito Witch (The Hemoprophet).publicNotes:
蚊女巫外表类似人形，有着令人不舒服的蜡黄皮肤。她似乎总是低着头，耸着肩膀，一头蓬乱的黑发遮住整个脸，只能看见一双一眨不眨的红眼睛和一条又长又尖的舌头，舌头僵硬突出就像个长长的鼻子，背后长着有血肉和骨头的蚊子翅膀。她有六条胳膊，但胳膊上没有长手，而是逐渐变细形成畸形的尖端，像虫蛹的腿一样紧紧抱在胸前。她细长的双腿也逐渐变尖；当她吃饱而肿胀起来之后，就必须用全部八条肢体行走，这八条肢体会在地面上留下小孔一样的足迹。

血先知 The Hemoprophet

微光滩的居民精通某些民间占卜法，比如在风吹动的谷壳中寻找和解读图案。他们很快将占卜的力量归因于蚊女巫。

据说“血先知“能够觉察出难题的存在，她会造访那些面临艰难抉择或谜题的人的梦境。女巫会提出为做梦者面临的最深奥的问题提供解决方法，如果做梦者接受，女巫就会在他们的睡梦中吸取他们的血液，体会不同的选择，并用吸取的血液在旁边写下答案。这个版本的蚊女巫不一定怀有恶意，但她也不在乎吸取过多的血，或是让整个微光滩都看到她用血写下的令人尴尬的事情。血的重量使她的脚步沉重，猎人们经常说，任何人留下的特别深的足迹都是“满载着答案”，以向女巫表示敬意。

Grootslang.name: 古鲁刺朗象蛇 Grootslang
Grootslang.publicNotes:
虽然第一眼很容易将古鲁刺朗象蛇认成大象，但一旦它身体的全貌被看见，这种生物就如同被一条足以吞下一整栋楼的大蛇从内部操纵着的一个怪诞的木偶。一条古鲁刺朗象蛇直立可达20英尺高，拥有如同板鳞甲一般的皮肤与一对硕大的前臂，那显眼的六根獠牙能够不费吹灰之力刺穿血肉与骨骼。它身体的其余部分可长达60英尺。古鲁刺朗象蛇的脸类似大象，但和它的蛇形表亲一样，它可以将下颌脱臼从而囫囵吞下猎物。

遭遇到古鲁刺朗象蛇的人存在微薄的可能与其讲道理或贿赂这头巨兽，这或许能够免于一死。然而一屋子的宝石也未必能够破财消灾，而一条特别残暴的古鲁刺朗象蛇也可能在收到贡品之后再反悔。

Deep Breath.name: 深呼吸 Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: 古鲁刺朗象蛇能够屏息1小时。

Aquatic Elusion.name: 水遁 Aquatic Elusion
Aquatic Elusion.description:
需求 古鲁刺朗象蛇完全浸没在水中；

效果 古鲁刺朗象蛇传送到1英里范围内的另一处足以承载古鲁刺朗象蛇的水体中。

Defensive Coil.name: 防守缠结 Defensive Coil
Defensive Coil.description: 古鲁刺朗象蛇将身体蜷缩成环状。它获得20点对物理伤害的抗力直到下回合开始。

Swallow Whole.name: 活吞 Swallow Whole
Swallow Whole.description:
仅限啃咬，超大型，@Damage[(3d12+10)[bludgeoning]]伤害，破裂值37

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

Thunderous Slam.name: 雷霆猛击 Thunderous Slam
Thunderous Slam.description:
古鲁刺朗象蛇对一个触及范围内的生物进行一次脚踩打击。

不论攻击是否命中，古鲁刺朗象蛇周围10尺内的生物必须进行一次@Check[reflex|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物直到他的回合结束变为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。

失败 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]并受到@Damage[2d8[bludgeoning]]伤害。

大失败 同失败，但生物受到@Damage[4d8[bludgeoning]]伤害。

Grogrisant.publicNotes: Grogrisant is an enormous lion with multiple eyes and a golden, glowing mane. As it was originally slain by Taldor's founding emperor, the legendary hero Taldaris, Grogrisant's appearance marks both danger for the people of Taldor and the potential for Taldans to prove their might against a creature from their fabled past. How it continues to appear time and time again remains a mystery, one that Taldan scholars continuously attempt to decipher.

Aura of Blinding Light.name: Aura of Blinding Light
Aura of Blinding Light.description: 40 feet. Any creature that begins its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:34|traits:damaging-effect] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 minute and become temporarily immune for 1 day. If the creature critically fails this save, it's permanently blinded.

Dual Pounce.name: Dual Pounce
Dual Pounce.description: Grogrisant Strides and makes two claw Strikes against the same creature at the end of that movement. Each attack counts against Grogrisant's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after Grogrisant makes both attacks. If both attacks hit, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description:
claw.

If Grogrisant Rends after a successful Dual Pounce, combine the Rend's damage with that from the Dual Pounce for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Rend]

Vicious Rend.name: Vicious Rend
Vicious Rend.description:
Trigger Grogrisant uses Rend

Effect The target's armor takes damage equal to the damage from Rend. The target can attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:37|basic] save, negating the armor damage on a successful save.

Grogrisant.name: Grogrisant

Bloodcurdling Screech.description:
The owlbear unleashes a loud screech that terrifies its prey. Each creature in an @Template[emanation|distance:80] must attempt a @Check[will|dc:22] save. Regardless of the result, creatures are temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.
Bloodcurdling Screech.name: Bloodcurdling Screech

Gnaw.name: Gnaw
Gnaw.description:
Requirements The owlbear has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} with its talons.

Effect The owlbear attempts to disembowel the creature with a beak Strike. If the Strike hits, the target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:24] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The target is sickened 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} as long as it remains sickened.

Screeching Advance.name: Screeching Advance
Screeching Advance.description: The owlbear makes a Bloodcurdling Screech and Strides twice. All creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:80]{80 feet} of the owlbear at any point during this movement are subjected to the effects of Bloodcurdling Screech.

Irriseni Owlbear.name: Irriseni Owlbear
Irriseni Owlbear.publicNotes:
A cultural symbol for Irrisen, the Irriseni owlbear is particularly well adapted to frosty conditions. These owlbears are larger than their temperate zone counterparts.

With the body of a powerful brown bear and the keen senses of an owl, the owlbear is a dangerous territorial predator, fearlessly attacking any creature that strays into its domain. Those who run afoul of an owlbear hear its terrifying screech only seconds before the massive creature is upon them, ripping them apart with deadly talons and a powerful beak.

Although their origin is lost to time, owlbears are assumed to be the result of a magical experiment to make a more cunning predator. According to the legend, the wizard was too successful and ended up being the flrst victim of the beast. Today, owlbears can be found around the world, with a variety of features. While the most common subspecies looks like a brown bear with the features of a great horned owl, owlbears from the frozen north might resemble polar bears mixed with snowy owls, and in temperate rain forests they might resemble black bears with the heads of barn owls.

Most owlbears live solitary lives, gathering only to mate and raise cubs, which are hatched from eggs. An owlbear's territory usually extends to around 5 miles from its lair, with clear signs of its habitat appearing with 1 mile (clawed up trees, gigantic feathers, and shredded carcasses). The lair of an owlbear rarely holds anything of value, but some adventurers have found trinkets, coins, and even jewelry in the massive pellets of undigested bones these monsters leave behind.

Kuworsys.name: Kuworsys

+4 Bonus on Perception to Find traps.name: +4 Bonus on Perception to Find traps

Gauge Potential.description: Kuworsys studies a creature it can see, attempting to predict its actions. The creature attempts a @Check[will|dc:32] save. On a failed save, Kuworsys predicts the creature's moves, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and AC against the target creature for 1 minute.
Gauge Potential.name: Gauge Potential

Infectious Spores.name: Infectious Spores
Infectious Spores.description:
Kuworsys releases a choking field of spores within a @Template[burst|distance:30]{30-foot radius}, continuing to release them until the end of its next turn. Creatures who begin their turns within the area of the spores, or who enter the area, must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:32|traits:disease] save. On a failure, the creature becomes afflicted with addictive exhaustion.

Kuworsys then can't use its Infectious Spores again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Infectious Spores]]{1d4 rounds}.

Pinion.name: Pinion
Pinion.description:
Trigger A creature within 10 feet of Kuworsys uses an action to Fly

Requirements Kuworsys is Reared Back

Effect Kuworsys lashes out at the triggering creature, attempting to swat it to the ground. Kuworsys attempts a melee Strike against the creature. If the Strike hits, the creature's movement is interrupted. The creature is knocked to the ground; on a critical hit, they also can't Fly again for 1 minute.

Addictive Exhaustion.name: Addictive Exhaustion
Addictive Exhaustion.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:32]

Creatures with addictive exhaustion can't reduce their sickened condition from addictive exhaustion while they have the disease

Stage 1 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. One skill of the creature's choice doesn't suffer the status penalty from this sickened condition to its skill checks (1 day)

Stage 2 As Stage 1, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (5 days)

Stage 3 As Stage 2, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3} and has incurable hunger and thirst, in addition to being fatigued (1 day)

Rear Back.description: Kuworsys stands on its two hind limbs, bringing its other four limbs to bear on its foes. Kuworsys stays Reared Back until it uses a single action to return to its normal stance. While Kuworsys is Reared Back, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} but can use its Pinion and Yank abilities.
Rear Back.name: Rear Back

Yank.name: Yank
Yank.description:
Requirements Kuworsys is Reared Back

Effect Kuworsys makes a melee limb Strike against a creature and, on a success, attempts to steal the creature's weapon from its hands. Kuworsys attempts a @Check[thievery|defense:reflex] check against the target's Reflex DC.

Critical Success The creature's weapon falls to the floor in the creature's space.

Success Until the start of that creature's turn, attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the creature of its weapon gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and the target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the weapon or other checks requiring a firm grasp on the weapon.

Failure The creature is unaffected.

Critical Failure The creature can use a reaction to attempt a melee Strike against Kuworsys with the weapon Kuworsys attempted to grab.

Kuworsys.publicNotes:
At a distance, the creature known as Kuworsys might be mistaken for a crawling undead hand, possessed of two thumbs instead of one. These "thumbs" are actually the being's hind limbs, which it can clumsily stand upon should it choose. Each of its fingerlike limbs bears a smaller hand on the end, giving Kuworsys an eerie gait possessed of too many moving joints. Wedged within the wrist-shaped tissue that makes up the creature's head are three bloodshot eyes, glaring balefully from lids twisted into shape from ropes of flesh.

Whether part of its base nature or due to its long imprisonment, Kuworsys appears to be skinned and rotting, its body riddled with ragged holes held together by raw sinew. Despite its glistening and putrid appearance, it isn't undead, nor does it leave any trace of blood or gristle in its wake. Those who believe its condition might slow it down are often shocked by the creature's jittering speed, and those who believe they might be able to track it by the scent of rotting flesh find themselves inhaling the beast's deadly, exhausting spores instead.

When encountering another creature, Kuworsys doesn't approach initially, instead observing the stranger while hidden or at a distance. While it might grow bolder and approach to examine or provoke another being, it prefers to avoid direct confrontation and is intelligent and stealthy enough to deftly avoid discovery. Its presence proves deadly enough, even without any further aggression, as those who Kuworsys stalks eventually succumb to a lethal lethargy.

Young Linnorm.name: 青年蛇龙 Young Linnorm
Young Linnorm.publicNotes: 雌性蛇龙会在她们众所周知的狩猎场产卵。一枚蛇龙蛋可以存活许多年，被坚硬如同皮革的外壳保护，很容易被误认成石头。当一条雄性蛇龙最终偶然发现蛋后，他会给它授精然后将它带到一个安全偏僻的所在，把它独自留在那里直到孵化。新生的蛇龙会在巢穴里躲藏数个月，直到他们成长得能够独立狩猎，开始迈向这个世界为止。这些蛇龙大致相当于其他物种稍大一点的青年。青年蛇龙，虽然仍是与第一世界有着强烈联系的原始生物，但没有办法展露出太多他们的魔法能量。他们还不能呼出致命的火球或闪电，或看到隐形的生物，更重要的是，他们死去也没办法引发蛇龙传奇般的死亡诅咒。在这段时间内蛇龙是易受伤；发现青年蛇龙的斥候们召集汉子们和有经验的战士组成狩猎队，并快速地杀死它——在引起蛇龙父亲注意之前。
Young Linnorm.allSaves: 对抗魔法时全豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法时全豁免+1状态加值

Regeneration 5 (Deactivated by Cold Iron.name: 再生5（寒铁使其失效） Regeneration 5 (Deactivated by Cold Iron)

Attack of Opportunity (Tail Only).name: 反应打击（仅尾扫） Reactive Strike (Tail Only)

Young Linnorm Venom.name: 青年蛇龙毒 Young Linnorm Venom
Young Linnorm Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:25]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}

Orchid Mantis Swarm.name: 兰花螳螂群 Orchid Mantis Swarm
Orchid Mantis Swarm.publicNotes:
很少有生物像兰花螳螂一样美丽。它们优雅的外形和颜色都很像花朵，许多人把这种娇嫩的生物当做短命的宠物。虽然这些普通的昆虫对类人生物而言并不危险，但它们仍能捕食比自己大好几倍的猎物。兰花螳螂在花丛中展开身姿，以令人目眩的速度，甚至能用它们锋利的牙齿和强力的撕咬追赶觅食的蝴蝶。

有些螳螂与元素之力有着异常强烈的联系。虽然它们缺少运用这份能量的训练，但当兰花螳螂聚集在食物丰富或自然能量充沛的地方时，它们可以让树木在寒冬中开花 ，或将任何一片土地变成花园。尽管它们很美，但大群聚集似乎只会加剧螳螂的脾气。虽然螳螂个体是无害的，但任何打扰到这无数假花的人都可能会被认为是食物，无论体型大小。

Floral Camouflage.name: 花朵迷彩 Floral Camouflage
Floral Camouflage.description: 当躲藏时，兰花螳螂群可以从任意数量的叶子和花瓣处获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]，即便这些叶子和花瓣的厚度不足以使其他生物隐蔽。

Biting Blossom.name: 咬人之花 Biting Blossom
Biting Blossom.description: 集群空间内每个敌人受到@Damage[3d6[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:24|basic]豁免）。豁免失败的生物还将受到@Damage[1d4[persistent,bleed]]伤害。

Drifting Petals.name: 飘零花瓣 Drifting Petals
Drifting Petals.description:
集群飞行。被其移动穿越所处空间的生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:24]豁免，否则会被它们花一般的躯体所惊住。

大成功 无效果。

成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}状态，持续1轮。

失败 生物陷入目眩与@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1轮。

大失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}与@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，持续1轮。

Split.name: Split
Split.description: When a gunpowder ooze that has 10 or more HP is hit by an attack that would deal slashing or piercing damage, it splits into two identical oozes, each with half the original's HP. One ooze is in the same space as the original, and the other is in an adjacent, unoccupied space. If no adjacent space is unoccupied, it automatically pushes creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space (the GM decides if an object or creature is too big or heavy to push).

Gunpowder Residue.name: Gunpowder Residue
Gunpowder Residue.description: A creature hit by the gunpowder ooze's pseudopod or blast is coated in explosive material unless it succeeds at a @Check[reflex|dc:34] save. If a creature makes an attack with a firearm, takes fire damage, or uses an action, activity, or item with the fire trait while coated with the residue, the residue explodes, dealing @Damage[7d6[fire]] damage to the creature and all adjacent creatures (@Check[reflex|dc:34|basic]). The residue remains active for 24 hours, until it's ignited, or until it's scrubbed off (an activity that takes at least 10 minutes and requires soap and water). A creature can only be coated with one layer of gunpowder residue at a time.

Motion Sense.name: Motion Sense
Motion Sense.description: A gunpowder ooze can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

Combust.name: Combust
Combust.description: Due to the volatile nature of its composition, the gunpowder ooze reacts explosively when exposed to open flame. Any time the gunpowder ooze takes fire damage from a source other than a gunpowder ooze's combust or gunpowder residue, it explodes, dealing @Damage[15d6[fire]|options:area-damage] damage to creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:15] including itself (@Check[reflex|dc:34|basic|options:area-effect]). When the gunpowder ooze combusts, it automatically splits as long as it has 10 or more HP.

Gunpowder Ooze.name: Gunpowder Ooze
Gunpowder Ooze.publicNotes:
Gunpowder oozes are explosive gunpowder given life. By necessity, crafters of explosives and firearms are a careful lot, but even the best safety habits can be thwarted by greed, distraction, or carelessness. The release of toxic byproducts from gunsmithing would be an environmental problem anywhere, but when volatile runoff seeps into the Mana Wastes, it can interact with wild magic, causing a living, explosive nightmare.

A gunpowder ooze is a pockmarked, charcoal gray mass that slithers across the blighted verge between Alkenstar and the Mana Wastes with the sound of sizzles and sudden pops. It pursues and consumes any sort of organic matter, firing bullet-like projectiles to bring down prey. The ooze instinctively avoids fire, so travelers forced to camp in known gunpowder ooze territory often light bonfires despite the danger of advertising their presence to the Mana Wastes' other residents. Suggestions that local populations of oozes be weaponized, periodically put forward by unwise Alkenstari and Mana Waste tacticians, are uniformly shot down by cooler heads; those who attempt to proceed anyway usually meet explosive ends.

Howling Spawn.publicNotes: While Desert's Howl is presumed to be unique, given its inexplicable origin, there have been reports of creatures resembling Desert's Howl that stalk the sands of Thuvia. Though quite similar to the descriptions of Desert's Howl, they seem to be individuals who haven't yet fully completed their transformation into the terrifying beast. Whether these unfortunate people met a cruel fate similar to that which spawned Desert's Howl or are spawn of the nightmarish creature itself is unclear. Some reports of encounters with these creatures note that it's possible to revert the creature back to its humanoid form by cleansing its mind of nightmarish visions, though there's no solid evidence of such an event ever occurring.

Putrid Evanescence.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger The howling spawn is damaged by another creature

Effect The howling spawn bursts into a cloud of putrid smoke, ash, and nightmares, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} and teleporting up to 30 feet away to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the end of its next turn or until it uses a hostile action, whichever comes first.
Putrid Evanescence.name: Putrid Evanescence

Illusory Ambush.name: Illusory Ambush
Illusory Ambush.description: The howling spawn shimmers with illusions and devastates a foe who lost track of its position. It Strides up to twice its Speed. If it ends its movement within its melee reach of at least one enemy to which it is undetected, it can attempt two claw Strikes against that enemy. The howling spawn remains undetected to the creature it's attacking until after resolving both of the claw attacks.

Profane Feast.name: Profane Feast
Profane Feast.description:
Requirements The howling spawn has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Effect The howling spawn begins to consume the creature, dealing @Damage[(2d12+5)[piercing]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:30|basic] save) and exposing the creature to its paralytic secretion.

Fear Scent (Precise) 60 feet.name: Fear Scent (Precise) 60 feet
Fear Scent (Precise) 60 feet.description: Howling spawn can sense frightened creatures within 60 feet, using an incredibly accurate sense of psychic smell as a precise sense.

Paralytic Secretion.name: Paralytic Secretion
Paralytic Secretion.description: The howling spawn's saliva is a potent paralytic substance that drains the energy from its prey. A creature hit by its spit Strike must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:30] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} as well as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round. If the target was already drained, it instead increases the condition's value by 1, to a maximum of drained 4.

Howling Spawn.name: Howling Spawn

Powder Blast.name: Powder Blast
Powder Blast.description: The clockwork cannoneer spews flames from one of its cannons, dealing @Damage[8d6[fire]|options:area-damage] damage in a @Template[cone|distance:30] (@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic|options:area-effect]). Those that fail the save also take @Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]] damage.

Muzzleburn.name: Muzzleburn
Muzzleburn.description: The heat from a discharged cannon sears those who touch its metal shell. The clockwork cannoneer's bore Strike deal an additional 2d6 fire damage until the end of its next turn after it makes a cannonball Strike or uses its Bombard or Powder Blast abilities.

Wind-Up.name: Wind-Up
Wind-Up.description:
24 hours, @Check[thievery|dc:33|traits:action:disable-a-device] check, standby

For a clockwork to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for the listed amount of time, usually 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again. Some clockworks' abilities require them to spend some of their remaining operational time. They can't spend more than they have and shut down immediately once they have 0 time remaining. If it's unclear when a clockwork was last wound, most clockwork keepers wind all their clockworks at a set time, typically 8 a.m.

A clockwork that lists standby in its wind-up entry can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).

A creature can attempt to Disable a Device to wind a clockwork down (with a DC listed in the wind-up entry). For each success, the clockwork loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the clockwork is in standby mode.

Bombard.name: Bombard
Bombard.description: The clockwork cannoneer launches an explosive shot up to a range of 200 feet that explodes in a @Template[burst|distance:20]. Creatures within the burst take @Damage[5d10[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic|options:area-effect]).

Clockwork Cannoneer.name: Clockwork Cannoneer
Clockwork Cannoneer.publicNotes:
Clockwork cannoneers are cannon-armed constructs created to defend the Grand Duchy of Alkenstar. The people of Alkenstar typically find conventional arms sufficient for battling creatures who wander out of the Mana Wastes, but recent increases in activity from the fleshforges of Nex and the necromantic chambers of Geb have spurred the people of the city into a flurry of defensive innovations. Created by an experimental collaboration between the city's gunsmiths and clockwork inventors, the clockwork cannoneer provides exceptional mobile firepower. Two cannon-arms swing at the sides of the 15-foot-tall automaton, and its body contains a hopper of cannonballs that are replenished by engineers when the creature is wound up for duty. Triple-walled reinforcement on the cannoneer's black-powder reservoirs provides ample protection from the accidental explosions and backfires that often troubled early prototypes of the finely engineered machine. The current design combines the long-range capabilities of field artillery with the stopping power of a firedrake against engaged enemies, and its heat-tempered gear assembly minimizes warping that might cause slipping, grinding, or shaking.

While reports from living artillery members serving alongside clockwork cannoneers complain of blisters, smoke inhalation, and singed eyebrows, the Grand Duchy's chief clockwork machinists have assured the city's leadership that the constructs function well within safety parameters. The clockwork cannoneer's self-sufficient construction frees crews to see to those battlefield tasks that can, for the moment, only be conducted by sentient beings.

Intelligence reports from Quantium and Absalom indicate that attempts to replicate the clockwork cannoneer's design have been spectacularly unsuccessful.

Charau-ka Butcher.name: 查咯屠夫 Charau-ka Butcher
Charau-ka Butcher.publicNotes:
虽然查咯猿人以其残忍而闻名，但有些人对暴力的痴迷连同类都害怕。这些致命的屠夫精通给敌人造成恶毒、血腥伤口的艺术，他们认为除了查咯猿人之外的任何人都是敌人。 一口敌人的血可以赋予他们可怕的力量，就好像查咯屠夫真的从受害者的痛苦中获得了力量。

传说表示查咯猿人与恶魔领主安加赞（Angazhan）有着共同的祖先，安加赞改造了哪些曾经试图反抗其邪教的人类的身体，由此创造了第一只查咯猿人。有传言说，查咯猿人的祭司们为了纪念这个古老的起源，改进了某种可怕的仪式，迫使哪些被其杀死的凡人转化为新的查咯猿人。其他的故事表明，某种用来敬拜安加赞的强大图腾拥有这样的力量，在这些魔法神器前面进行祭祀仪式，就能让死者的灵魂作为野蛮和毁灭之主安加赞的暴力信徒复活。

不久前，大多数查咯猿人还团结在猩猩王鲁萨泽克（Ruthazek the Gorilla King）的旗下。鲁萨泽克是个强大的军阀，是安加赞的忠实信徒，统治着乌萨罗（Usaro）。但当冒险者挑战并打败了鲁萨泽克之后，查咯猿人分裂了，各个氏族分散在丛林各处，各自都由一个强大的军阀领导。

Blood Fury.name: 血怒 Blood Fury
Blood Fury.description:
触发 查咯屠夫对一个生物造成流血伤害。

效果 查咯猿人舔舐武器上的血迹，陷入狂怒。他恢复@Damage[5[healing]]HP，并且直到他回合结束前，他的攻击骰获得+1状态加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.LOLoQpaAp5cC0hbm]

Mauler.name: 拳手 Mauler
Mauler.description: 当查咯屠夫在狂暴状态下，他的近战打击造成额外@Damage[1d4[bleed]]伤害。

Rage.name: 狂暴 Rage
Rage.description:
需求 查咯屠夫并未@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]或狂暴。

查咯屠夫唤起内心的怒意，开始狂暴。查咯屠夫获得等于你的等级+体质调整值的临时生命值。狂暴持续1分钟，或者直到没有查咯屠夫能发现的敌人存在，又或者直到查咯屠夫失去意识，以先发生的情况为准。查咯屠夫无法主动停止狂暴。在狂暴期间：

  • 查咯屠夫用近战武器或非武装攻击可造成额外2点伤害。若查咯屠夫的武器或无武装攻击有灵巧特征，此额外伤害减半。
  • 查咯屠夫的AC受到-1减值。
  • 查咯屠夫无法采取具有专注特征但不具有狂暴特征的行动。查咯屠夫可以在狂暴时进行搜索。

在查咯屠夫停止狂暴后，查咯屠夫失去狂暴赋予的所有临时生命值，并且在1分钟内无法再次狂暴。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]

Shrieking Frenzy.name: 暴怒尖啸 Shrieking Frenzy
Shrieking Frenzy.description:
触发 查咯猿人的回合开始。

频率 每小时一次

效果 查咯猿人获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]状态，直到它的下一回合结束，并且他可以用此额外动作打击或行走。

在狂怒生效期间，由于查咯猿人不断大声嚎叫，因此无法说话，隐秘检定也会自动失败。

Thrown Weapon Mastery.name: 精通投掷武器 Thrown Weapon Mastery
Thrown Weapon Mastery.description:
查咯猿人的投掷武器获得“致命D6”特征。

此外，如果查咯猿人投掷一件临时武器，既不会因此受到-2减值，也不会因为投掷一件具有非致命特征的临时武器来造成致命伤害而受到减值。

Biloko Warrior.name: 鳄吻勇士 Biloko Warrior
Biloko Warrior.publicNotes:
鳄吻精喜欢在黑暗、孤立的丛林中以小而隐秘的队形移动。当一群鳄吻精找到合适的狩猎场时，他们会独占这片区域，然后挖设陷坑，用藤蔓制作圈套、在树冠上架设伏击猎物用的藏匿点。

鳄吻精是长着鳄鱼嘴的精类，他们在芒吉莽原出没，以人类的肉为食。鳄吻精邪恶狡猾，他们使用致命的陷阱和游击狩猎战术来捕捉猎物——通常是倒霉的探险者或误入丛林的村民，他们中的许多人认为鳄吻精是残忍的先祖之魂。这些生物中最强大的被称为“鳄吻怪”，拥有强大的变形魔法。

鳄吻精对铃铛情有独钟，敲钟的声音往往预示着附近有鳄吻精出没。除了在外出打猎时携带和敲响铃铛外，鳄吻精有时还会用强大的魔法为铃铛附魔，或者将铃铛挂在绳子上作为营地的警报器。

鳄吻精看起来像细长但结实的类人生物，有着鳄鱼般的脑袋、铁锈色的皮肤和血红色的眼睛。他们只吃人形生物的肉，并且他们只吃一顿就能存活很长时间，这要归功于他们像蛇一样吞下整个中型人形生物的能力。他们会松开下颚骨，然后把受害者从头到脚慢慢吞下。多亏了他们酸性的唾液和锋利的牙齿，鳄吻精可以将食物咀嚼成易于消化的肉糜，甚至在吞咽时也能将肉和骨头磨成浓缩的糊状物；因此，它们在吞食两倍或三倍于自身大小的食物时不会犹豫。

刚饱餐一顿的鳄吻精很容易通过肿胀下坠的腹部识别出来。然而，尽管它们此时看起来移动缓慢，但危险性也不亚于平时，因为它们钟情于杀戮，并且可能有饥饿的同伴躲在附近等待另一顿大餐。

Inspired Feast.name: 盛宴 Inspired Feast
Inspired Feast.description:
如果鳄吻精花费1分钟以上的时间来吞食一具人类尸体，他们的攻击骰获得+1状态加值，伤害骰获得+2状态加值，持续1小时。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.EM0VP31B8CyjFD15]

Zinba.name: Zinba

Tighten Coils.name: Tighten Coils
Tighten Coils.description:
Trigger A creature grabbed or restrained by the zinba attempts to Escape

Effect The DC of the Escape check is increased by 2.

Slither.description: The zinba Strides, Climbs, or Swims up to half its Speed, pulling any creatures it has grabbed with it.
Slither.name: Slither

Zinba Restoration.name: Zinba Restoration
Zinba Restoration.description:
The zinba bites a creature within reach and delivers a restorative healing remedy instead of its venom. The creature takes @Damage[1[piercing]] damage, but then gains fast healing 5 for 1 minute.

In addition, the restorative attempts a counteract check against any poison or disease affecting the creature with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+22]]{+22}.

A creature that receives the restorative is temporarily immune to the zinba's restorative for 24 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.dslTaCkliOH5lZ6k]{Effect: Zinba Restoration}

Zinba Venom.name: Zinba Venom
Zinba Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:29]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}

Zinba.publicNotes:
Commonly known as ghost serpents, zinbas are rare, amphibious snakes with healing abilities. They're of similar size to other large snakes, such as pythons, but have a distinct bright blue coloring with red-and-black patterned stripes along their backs. This distinct coloration is easy to spot, but zinbas can swim through the wet mud and soft earth of their homes to avoid being tracked by all but the most skilled pursuers. This elusiveness inspires their "ghost serpent" moniker.

A zinba can metabolize a unique additive for its venom that converts it from a deadly poison to a healing agent, which makes zinbas particularly valuable in the eyes of healers and poachers. There is a high demand for zinbas in many markets; live serpents fetch a hefty sum, but zinba eggs are especially valuable, as zinbas reared in captivity are less willful and more likely to eat in confinement. Their elusiveness, however, leads many to search for their dens instead, which are large pools of water among remote wetlands or underground hollows near bodies of water. The water of a zinba's pool also has minor but valuable healing qualities, but removing water from a den causes it to lose its healing properties after a few hours, so most who find a den attempt to immediately make use of it.

Even finding dens is a difficult prospect, since zinbas are particularly intelligent for animals and can recognize signs of travelers near their favored hiding places. When there are signs of danger, a zinba collapses its lair and flees to create another den elsewhere.

Kaava Stalker.publicNotes:
Kaava hunting parties can number in the dozens, although they blend easily into the forest and cover all traces of their passage. While community elders assign various tasks to hunting parties, such as recovering food or deterring intruders, the parties are expected to accomplish these tasks as they see fit.

Kaava are stealthy, jungle-dwelling humanoids with short down feathers that can easily be mistaken for fur from a distance. Kaava have tough scales beneath these feathers. Both the scales and feathers have mutable pigmentation that allows a kaava to blend into surrounding foliage like a chameleon.

Trackless.name: Trackless
Trackless.description: A kaava moving at half their Speed or less steps so lightly that they leave virtually no trace. The DCs of checks to Track a kaava are increased by 10.

Skulking Attack.name: Skulking Attack
Skulking Attack.description: If a kaava stalker starts their turn @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by a creature, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the Kaava's attacks until the end of the turn.

Kaava Stalker.name: Kaava Stalker

Kothogaz, Dance Of Disharmony.name: Kothogaz, Dance Of Disharmony
Kothogaz, Dance Of Disharmony.publicNotes: Kothogaz is a towering horror of claws and eyes, surrounded by swarming insects.

Swallow Whole.name: Swallow Whole
Swallow Whole.description:
Huge, @Damage[(4d10+18)[bludgeoning],2d12[sonic]]{4d10+18 bludgeoning plus 2d12 sonic} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} while swallowed, Rupture 40

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

Horrific Speed.name: Horrific Speed
Horrific Speed.description: Kothogaz is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. It can use this extra action to Stride or Strike.

Noxious Aura.name: Noxious Aura
Noxious Aura.description: 120 feet. A creature that enters or begins its turn in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:41] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (sickened 3 on a critical failure).

Tympanic Heartbeat.name: Tympanic Heartbeat
Tympanic Heartbeat.description: 120 feet. Kothogaz's heartbeat booms like a deity's drum. A creature that enters or begins its turn in the emanation must attempt a @Check[will|dc:41] save. On a failure, its next two actions must be move actions to move at least half its Speed away from Kothogaz. A creature that critically succeeds is temporarily immune to tympanic heartbeat for 1 minute.

Disharmonic Door.name: Disharmonic Door
Disharmonic Door.description: Kothogaz disappears, then bursts as a cacophonous sound from the throat of a creature within 240 feet. Kothogaz appears within reach of the creature and makes a melee Strike against it. The Strike deals an additional @Damage[2d12[sonic]] damage.

Many-Eyed Blight.name: Many-Eyed Blight
Many-Eyed Blight.description:
@Check[fortitude|dc:44]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}

Stage 2 stupefied 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}

Stage 4 if you die, at the next new moon, your body splits, and your viscera become an undead under Kothogaz's control.

Pox the Land.name: Pox the Land
Pox the Land.description: Kothogaz raises a pustule from the ground within 120 feet, which erupts in a @Template[cylinder|distance:10]{10-foot radius}, 200-foot-high cylinder of cloying filth. Creatures in the area must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:44|basic|options:area-effect] save or take @Damage[6d10[poison]|options:area-damage] damage. On a failure, they can't fly for 1 round (1 minute on a critical failure); flying creatures fall safely to the ground.

Suppurating Passage.name: Suppurating Passage
Suppurating Passage.description: The earth festers in Kothogaz's wake. Kothogaz Strides up to its Speed. Squares through which Kothogaz passes are greater difficult terrain until the start of its next turn, and any creature that enters or begins its turn in those squares must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:44] save or take @Damage[4d10[poison],4d10[acid]]{4d10 poison damage and 4d10 acid damage} (on a critical failure, double damage and exposed to many-eyed blight).

Biloko Veteran.name: 鳄吻老兵 Biloko Veteran
Biloko Veteran.publicNotes:
斩获足够多战利品的鳄吻老兵能赢得同伴的尊重和畏惧。

鳄吻精是长着鳄鱼嘴的精类，他们在芒吉莽原出没，以人类的肉为食。鳄吻精邪恶狡猾，他们使用致命的陷阱和游击狩猎战术来捕捉猎物——通常是倒霉的探险者或误入丛林的村民，他们中的许多人认为鳄吻精是残忍的先祖之魂。这些生物中最强大的被称为“鳄吻怪”，拥有强大的变形魔法。

鳄吻精对铃铛情有独钟，敲钟的声音往往预示着附近有鳄吻精出没。除了在外出打猎时携带和敲响铃铛外，鳄吻精有时还会用强大的魔法为铃铛附魔，或者将铃铛挂在绳子上作为营地的警报器。

鳄吻精看起来像细长但结实的类人生物，有着鳄鱼般的脑袋、铁锈色的皮肤和血红色的眼睛。他们只吃人形生物的肉，并且他们只吃一顿就能存活很长时间，这要归功于他们像蛇一样吞下整个中型人形生物的能力。他们会松开下颚骨，然后把受害者从头到脚慢慢吞下。多亏了他们酸性的唾液和锋利的牙齿，鳄吻精可以将食物咀嚼成易于消化的肉糜，甚至在吞咽时也能将肉和骨头磨成浓缩的糊状物；因此，它们在吞食两倍或三倍于自身大小的食物时不会犹豫。

刚饱餐一顿的鳄吻精很容易通过肿胀下坠的腹部识别出来。然而，尽管它们此时看起来移动缓慢，但危险性也不亚于平时，因为它们钟情于杀戮，并且可能有饥饿的同伴躲在附近等待另一顿大餐。

Inspired Feast.name: 盛宴 Inspired Feast
Inspired Feast.description:
如果鳄吻精花费1分钟以上的时间来吞食一具人类尸体，他们的攻击骰获得+1状态加值，伤害骰获得+2状态加值，持续1小时。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.EM0VP31B8CyjFD15]

Swipe.name: 猛击 Swipe
Swipe.description:
老兵进行一次近战打击，并将检定结果与两个敌人的AC进行比较，每个敌人都必须在近战触及范围内且彼此相邻。老兵只投掷一次伤害骰，对每个被击中的生物施加伤害。

一次猛击在计算老兵的多重攻击减值时视作2次攻击。

Eloko.name: 鳄吻怪 Eloko
Eloko.publicNotes:
如果鳄吻精足够幸运，吞下几个施法者或拥有内在法术的生物，它将经历一次微小的变化，持续1周时间。这样的怪物被称为鳄吻怪。除了它们令人难以置信的胃口之外（甚至以鳄吻精的标准来看），它们还有变为巨大体型的超自然能力。

鳄吻精是长着鳄鱼嘴的精类，他们在芒吉莽原出没，以人类的肉为食。鳄吻精邪恶狡猾，他们使用致命的陷阱和游击狩猎战术来捕捉猎物——通常是倒霉的探险者或误入丛林的村民，他们中的许多人认为鳄吻精是残忍的先祖之魂。这些生物中最强大的被称为“鳄吻怪”，拥有强大的变形魔法。

鳄吻精对铃铛情有独钟，敲钟的声音往往预示着附近有鳄吻精出没。除了在外出打猎时携带和敲响铃铛外，鳄吻精有时还会用强大的魔法为铃铛附魔，或者将铃铛挂在绳子上作为营地的警报器。

鳄吻精看起来像细长但结实的类人生物，有着鳄鱼般的脑袋、铁锈色的皮肤和血红色的眼睛。他们只吃人形生物的肉，并且他们只吃一顿就能存活很长时间，这要归功于他们像蛇一样吞下整个中型人形生物的能力。他们会松开下颚骨，然后把受害者从头到脚慢慢吞下。多亏了他们酸性的唾液和锋利的牙齿，鳄吻精可以将食物咀嚼成易于消化的肉糜，甚至在吞咽时也能将肉和骨头磨成浓缩的糊状物；因此，它们在吞食两倍或三倍于自身大小的食物时不会犹豫。

刚饱餐一顿的鳄吻精很容易通过肿胀下坠的腹部识别出来。然而，尽管它们此时看起来移动缓慢，但危险性也不亚于平时，因为它们钟情于杀戮，并且可能有饥饿的同伴躲在附近等待另一顿大餐。

Inspired Feast.name: 盛宴 Inspired Feast
Inspired Feast.description:
如果鳄吻怪花费1分钟以上的时间来吞食一具人类尸体，他们的攻击骰获得+1状态加值，伤害骰获得+2状态加值，持续1小时。

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.EM0VP31B8CyjFD15]

Size Alteration.name: 体型增大 Size Alteration
Size Alteration.description: 鳄吻怪受到4环级@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]效果影响，该效果持续1分钟，并且鳄吻怪可以主动解除效果。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 鳄吻怪对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物额外造成2d6精准伤害。

Solar Ibis.name: Solar Ibis

Blinding Halo.name: Blinding Halo
Blinding Halo.description:
30 feet. The solar ibis's halo sheds bright light. Creatures that start their turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:22] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute. A creature that critically fails its save is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 minute.

Creatures who successfully save are temporarily immune to this effect for 24 hours.

The solar ibis can extinguish or resume the halo's light as a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When a solar ibis succeeds at a Reflex save, it gets a critical success instead.

Ibis Dive.name: Ibis Dive
Ibis Dive.description: The solar ibis Flies up to double its fly Speed in a straight line, descends at least 10 feet, and then makes a talon Strike.

Light Shatter.name: Light Shatter
Light Shatter.description:
The solar ibis detonates its halo, sending shards of burning light in all directions that deal @Damage[6d8[fire]|options:area-damage] damage to all creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:20] (@Check[reflex|dc:22|basic|options:area-effect] save). The shards deal an extra @Damage[6d8[spirit]|options:area-damage] damage against fiends and undead.

The solar ibis can't use Light Shatter again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Light Shatter]] rounds, and its Blinding Halo is extinguished during this time. The halo is restored automatically once the 1d4 rounds have passed.

Solar Ibis.publicNotes:
Solar ibis are beings of light sometimes called sun birds, or "winged luminaries" by the more scholarly inclined. They're tasked with guarding sacred places or items, although they sometimes also protect the living from places of incredible danger. Their appearance is always preceded by numerous small purple-winged birds with a splash of yellow on their crowns; these are avatars of the ibis that nest and congregate in areas it protects. The presence of these avatars is often the only way to track these reclusive and solitary creatures. Should the solar ibis choose to appear, these little birds scatter like wild fowl. The sun bird then manifests and bathes the area in a brilliant shower of light that can blind and startle unwary and unprepared creatures in its presence.

The solar ibis appears as a magnificent, large bird surrounded by a halo of brilliant light. Its black feathers shimmer with all the colors of the spectrum, casting glossy rainbows across its plumage. It has a keen sense of insight, which it uses to pass judgment as a whole on whether those before it are worthy to access what it guards. It punishes those it finds unworthy with its cleansing might.

Though considered sacred by most within the Mwangi Expanse, there are still some who hunt these glorious creatures; some seek the treasures that the ibis keep, while others seek the ibis themselves, dead or alive. Some believe that the feathers of a solar ibis, when burned, create an incense that can grant holy power to those that inhale it. Others believe that its bones and feet can be ground into a powder that can destroy demons and purify the undead.

Jelly Gluttony.description: If Taljjae detects buckwheat jelly with its jelly sense, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by the food and the creature possessing it (if applicable) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to all other creatures for [[/gmr 1d4 #Rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, or until it uses an appropriate number of Interact actions to consume the jelly (generally 2: 1 to take the jelly, and another to eat it). If there's more than one helping of jelly, the condition ends once Taljjae consumes the jelly once.
Jelly Gluttony.name: Jelly Gluttony

Jelly Sense.name: Jelly Sense
Jelly Sense.description: Taljjae has scent as a precise sense out to 120 feet, but only to detect buckwheat jelly, the only food Taljjae loves more than flesh.

Prop Master.name: Prop Master
Prop Master.description: Taljjae has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields from one of its masks.

Second Act.name: Second Act
Second Act.description:
Trigger Taljjae's turn begins Requirements Taljjae has 200 or fewer Hit Points

Effect Taljjae's dance reaches a frantic climax, allowing it to change personas rapidly. Taljjae Changes Characters.

Exit Stage.name: Exit Stage
Exit Stage.description:
Trigger Taljjae is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect Taljjae retains 1 Hit Point and teleports to an empty space within 30 feet. One of its masks remains behind and is broken.

Gentle Facade.name: Gentle Facade
Gentle Facade.description: 60 feet. Serenity and a sense of ease blot out all other emotions. Creatures in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:37] save or become unable to be affected by beneficial emotion effects while within the aura and for 1 minute after leaving it. The creature is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

Change Characters.name: Change Characters
Change Characters.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Taljjae removes its current mask and dons a new one. The change refreshes Taljjae, restoring 25 Hit Points. Once Taljjae has removed a mask, it can't Change Characters back to that mask until it has worn all of its unbroken masks at least once, after which the cycle starts again. Taljjae can't don a broken mask.

When Taljjae Changes Characters, it gains access to the listed abilities. Any items (such as weapons) associated with its previous mask immediately disappear and are replaced by fresh ones for its new mask, but the effects of any mask abilities it has active persist. Removing a mask and later reapplying it doesn't restore any limited-use abilities.

Taljjae (The Grandmother).name: Taljjae (The Grandmother)
Taljjae (The Grandmother).publicNotes:
The form of Taljjae's body can vary from visit to visit or even moment to moment, but it's easily recognized due to its signature cloak and masks. So long as Taljjae's mood is placid, it can be approached safely, but its mercurial temperament can be hard to predict.

The kind eyes of this mask sap any attackers' will to fight while granting Taljjae powerful supportive magic.

Earth Block.name: Earth Block
Earth Block.description:
Trigger The kasesh takes physical damage while adjacent to stone or earth

Effect A rampart of stone or crystal emerges from a nearby surface, blocking the attack. The kasesh gains resistance physical 5 against the attack.

Gestalt.name: Gestalt
Gestalt.description: Two or more kaseshi can combine their scribed words to create something greater than either one alone. This has the effects of the Coven ability but no ritual is necessary, simply close proximity for 8 hours. All gestalts grant the following spells, which the gestalt can cast at any level up to 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TUj8eugNqAvB1vVR]{Creation}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.m4Mc5XbdML92BKOE]{Strange Geometry}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tpLTLbJUrYcMWGld]{Telekinetic Haul}. Individual kaseshi also grant additional spells to any gestalt they join—this one grants @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{One with Stone} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.McnPlLFvKtQVXNcG]{Shape Stone}.

Kasesh (Stone).name: Kasesh (Stone)
Kasesh (Stone).publicNotes:
In the ancient days, before humanity dwelled on Golarion, the Vault Builders had need of something smaller in scale than the great vault seeds so they could finish their worlds as they liked. They took a small gem and wrote a word of power upon it. They gave it eyes so it could see and legs so it could walk, and made it wise. These creatures are known as kaseshi by scholars who have encountered them, though their true name—the one that brought them into being—is likely considerably more powerful.

Each kasesh bears a single word of power on their emerald body, from which they draw their mind and their magic. A kasesh with the word "Steel" or "Flame" is a single-minded creature, though it encompasses all possible permutations of meaning that the word possesses. A kasesh named "Home" or "Sorrow" has a far more complex psyche, and rumor claims that Elder Architect Oblosk of Nex bears the word "Memory." Unsurprisingly, many scholars are highly interested in the words on the kaseshi; unlike Thassilonian rune magic, no one has managed to decode or make use of the language of the Vault Builders yet.

The kasesh in the stat block bears the word "Stone," but other kaseshi will have their own magics. Some alternative examples, "Darkness" and "Intricacy," follow below.

Darkness: This kasesh built the hidden places of the Vault Builders' worlds. The kasesh is 7th level, grants @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rxvS7EMJ7qmexAyA]{Umbral Journey} to any gestalt they join, and has the following innate spells.

Primal Innate Spells 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness} (×2), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.eexkxcqnkXazsGfK]{Enervation}; 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VosLNn2M8S7JH67D]{Blindness} (×2), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nXmC2Xx9WmS5NsAo]{Share Lore}; 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{Mindlink}; Cantrips (4th) @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.60sgbuMWN0268dB7]{Telekinetic Projectile}

Intricacy: This kasesh was a decorator and designer. They're 11th level, grant @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{Mirage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ucf8eynbZMfUucjE]{Illusory Scene} to any gestalt they join, and have the following innate spells.

Primal Innate Spells 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0XP2XOxT9VSiXFDr]{Phantasmal Calamity}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer} (×2); 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TCk2MDwf5L5OYjFC]{Cloak of Colors}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.U58aQWJ47VrI36yP]{Hallucination}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nXmC2Xx9WmS5NsAo]{Share Lore}; 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{Mindlink}; Cantrips (6th) @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.60sgbuMWN0268dB7]{Telekinetic Projectile}

Frostbite Runes.name: 霜噬符文 Frostbite Runes
Frostbite Runes.description: 艾纳穆伦被苏门卡尔的符文所印记，一份与他们古老的诅咒挷定在一起的礼物。艾纳穆伦在对抗邪恶和死灵系法术和效果的豁免检定获得+1状态加值。他能感觉到邪恶不死生物的存在，犹如空气中弥漫着油腻腐败的味道；这种模糊的感觉能让你知道这种生物何时处于你的60尺之内，尽管他不能用这种感觉精确定位它们的位置。这种感觉也延伸到拥有虚能治疗能力的生物，例如吸血裔。

Blizzard Evasion.name: 暴雪回避 Blizzard Evasion
Blizzard Evasion.description:
触发 艾纳穆伦从单次攻击受到40点或以上的物理伤害，而且他不处于解体中

效果 艾纳穆伦解体成旋转的暴风雪，最多持续3轮。在此期间，你获得10点物理伤害抗力和力场伤害+10的弱点。他获得飞行速度40尺，但他唯一能采取的动作是飞行。每轮首次艾纳穆伦在解体时进入另一个生物的空间，或一个生物首次进入艾纳穆伦的空间时，该生物受到@Damage[4d8[cold]]伤害，并且必须成功通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:34]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。在艾纳穆伦的回合开始时，他能以一个自由动作结束此效果。

Snowblind.name: 雪盲 Snowblind
Snowblind.description: 艾纳穆伦能在下雪时@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]，即使它稀薄得不足以在正常情况下给予隐蔽。

Curse of the Saumen Kar.name: 苏门卡尔之诅咒 Curse of the Saumen Kar
Curse of the Saumen Kar.description:
频率 每日一次

效果 艾纳穆伦激活他身上的符文来创造一个寒冰监牢包围在60呎内他能看到的超大型或更小的生物。此监牢是由不融化的冰制成的球体，大小刚好足够包裹你的目标。目标和任何共享其空间的生物必须尝试@Check[reflex|dc:34]豁免。豁免失败的生物被困在监牢中。如果豁免成功，该生物将被推到监牢外由他选择的空间。若目标与一个巨型生物共享其空间，此效果失效。

此圆顶为AC 10、硬度 20和HP 40；它免疫寒冷、暴击和精准伤害。监牢会一直存在直到被摧毁、直到艾纳穆伦使用此能力创造一个新监牢、或直到他死亡。

Ainamuuren.name: 艾纳穆伦 Ainamuuren
Ainamuuren.publicNotes: 如同所有的苏门卡尔，艾纳穆伦是个头顶有巨角的高大威猛类人生物。厚实的白色皮毛复盖着错综复杂的非写实样式符文，包裹他的所有部位，除了露出皮毛下深色皮肤的脸部、手部、脚部。与其他苏门卡尔不同，艾纳穆伦拥有不只是两根而是四根长而弯曲的角，像一顶原始王冠一样从他的头顶突出。他携带的大型魔法巨斧附有错综复杂的非写实样式符文，与在他身上的符文非常相似，对角线和三角形有着同样敏锐的关注。
Ainamuuren.allSaves: 对抗邪恶和死灵系法术和效果时全豁免获得+1状态加值

Quaking Slither.disable: three @Check[athletics|dc:38|name:Brace for Earthquake (Athletics)|traits:environmental,kaiju,hazard] (trained), @Check[crafting|dc:38|name:Brace for Earthquake (Crafting)|traits:environmental,kaiju,hazard] (trained), or @Check[engineering|dc:38|name:Brace for Earthquake (Engineering)|traits:environmental,kaiju,hazard]{Engineering Lore} (trained) checks to brace a small structure or surface to cancel the effects of the quake in that area, or a single @Check[diplomacy|dc:41|name:Entreat With Ebeshra|traits:environmental,kaiju,hazard] (master) check to entreat Ebeshra to stand down
Quaking Slither.name: Quaking Slither

Quake.description:
Trigger Ebeshra moves at least 60 feet on land

Effect The ground shakes in a @Template[emanation|distance:120] from Ebeshra's space. This creates a variety of effects depending on the surrounding environment.

In an area without significant underground space, the ground becomes greater difficult terrain, and creatures on it are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 1 round.

In areas with existing underground spaces (like sewers, sinkholes, or catacombs), fissures open up in the ground. Creatures in the area tumble into the resulting 80-foot-deep hole unless they succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:40|name:Avoid Fissure|traits:environmental,kaiju,hazard] save.

In bays, on beaches, and in other relatively substantial but shallow bodies of water, the tremors create dangerous waves. Creatures in the water or within 60 feet of the waterline are struck by waves that deal @Damage[10d8[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:35|basic|name:Crashing Waves|traits:environmental,kaiju,hazard] save). On a critical failure, a creature is instantly swept 60 feet out to sea and 60 feet under the water's surface.
Quake.name: Quake

Quaking Slither.hazarddescription: Ebeshra slithers across the ground, causing the earth to tremble as though from a powerful earthquake.
Quaking Slither.reset: Ebeshra doesn't rush this way again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Rounds]] rounds.

Exit Stage.description:
Trigger Taljjae is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect Taljjae retains 1 Hit Point and teleports to an empty space within 30 feet. One of its masks remains behind and is broken.
Exit Stage.name: Exit Stage

Jelly Gluttony.name: Jelly Gluttony
Jelly Gluttony.description: If Taljjae detects buckwheat jelly with its jelly sense, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by the food and the creature possessing it (if applicable) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to all other creatures for [[/gmr 1d4 #Rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, or until it uses an appropriate number of Interact actions to consume the jelly (generally 2: 1 to take the jelly, and another to eat it). If there's more than one helping of jelly, the condition ends once Taljjae consumes the jelly once.

Jelly Sense.name: Jelly Sense
Jelly Sense.description: Taljjae has scent as a precise sense out to 120 feet, but only to detect buckwheat jelly, the only food Taljjae loves more than flesh.

Change Characters.name: Change Characters
Change Characters.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Taljjae removes its current mask and dons a new one. The change refreshes Taljjae, restoring 25 Hit Points. Once Taljjae has removed a mask, it can't Change Characters back to that mask until it has worn all of its unbroken masks at least once, after which the cycle starts again. Taljjae can't don a broken mask.

When Taljjae Changes Characters, it gains access to the listed abilities. Any items (such as weapons) associated with its previous mask immediately disappear and are replaced by fresh ones for its new mask, but the effects of any mask abilities it has active persist. Removing a mask and later reapplying it doesn't restore any limited-use abilities.

Masterful Engagement.name: Masterful Engagement
Masterful Engagement.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Taljjae maintains the perfect distance between itself and its foe. It Steps and Strikes, in any order.

Prop Master.name: Prop Master
Prop Master.description: Taljjae has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields from one of its masks.

Second Act.name: Second Act
Second Act.description:
Trigger Taljjae's turn begins Requirements Taljjae has 200 or fewer Hit Points

Effect Taljjae's dance reaches a frantic climax, allowing it to change personas rapidly. Taljjae Changes Characters.

Attack of Opportunity (Special).name: Attack of Opportunity (Special)
Attack of Opportunity (Special).description:
Taljjae disrupts actions on any hit, not just a critical hit.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Taljjae (The General).name: Taljjae (The General)
Taljjae (The General).publicNotes:
The form of Taljjae's body can vary from visit to visit or even moment to moment, but it's easily recognized due to its signature cloak and masks. So long as Taljjae's mood is placid, it can be approached safely, but its mercurial temperament can be hard to predict.

Carved scars mark the face of this severe mask, which gives Taljjae the skill at arms of a veteran commander.

Fafnheir.name: 法夫尼尔 Fafnheir
Fafnheir.publicNotes: 法夫尼尔是传说中的蛇龙之父。他比格拉利昂其他任何蛇龙都要更庞大，有着60尺的体长与超过10吨的重量。法夫尼尔是一个聪明而强大的生物，值得蛇龙诸王领地所有人畏惧。
Fafnheir.allSaves: 对抗魔法时全豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法时全豁免+1状态加值

Regeneration 20 (Deactivated by Cold Iro.name: 再生20（寒铁使其失效） Regeneration 20 (Deactivated by Cold Iron)

Attack of Opportunity (Tail Only).name: 反应打击（仅尾扫） Reactive Strike (Tail Only)

Curse of the Woeful Wyrd.name: 哀灵诅咒 Curse of the Woeful Wyrd
Curse of the Woeful Wyrd.description: 当一个生物杀死了法夫尼尔，他就将成为后者灵魂的居所，并缓慢地脱离其击杀者的身体。该生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:52]豁免，否则将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 2}（成功时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 1}，大成功时不受影响）。生物除非在豁免骰上取得大成功，否则每天毁灭状态值增加1。如果该生物在承受哀灵诅咒时死亡，其尸体会爆炸，如同一次@Template[burst|distance:60]范围的爆裂龙息。法夫尼尔立即以满HP无状态复活至尸体相邻的可用空间中。即便是间接死亡也能允许法夫尼尔以两者之间的玄学联系诅咒其击杀者。

Enormous.name: 极巨型 Enormous
Enormous.description: 法夫尼尔占据6*6的方格（30尺*30尺），且有60尺长。

Extra Reactions.name: 额外反应 Extra Reactions
Extra Reactions.description: 法夫尼尔在其回合开始时获得两个反应动作。

Spit Boiling Blood.name: 飞溅沸血 Spit Boiling Blood
Spit Boiling Blood.description:
触发 一个60尺内的生物伤害了法夫尼尔

效果 法夫尼尔朝触发生物飞溅出沸腾的血液。该生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免对抗沸腾之血。

Blasting Breath.name: 爆裂龙息 Blasting Breath
Blasting Breath.description: 法夫尼尔呼出一道带有闪电与飓风之力的毁灭性火焰风暴，对@Template[cone|distance:90]范围造成@Damage[20d6[fire]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:48|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。此外法夫尼尔对爆裂龙息范围内的一个由法夫尼尔选择的生物造成额外@Damage[10d6[electricity]|options:area-damage]伤害，遵循相同反射豁免结果。范围内生物还必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:48|name:Resist Winds|options:damaging-effect]豁免来抵御龙息带来的强风和致聋的雷鸣。豁免失败的生物将受到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]效果，如常影响大型及以下体型的生物。最后，强韧豁免失败的生物将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]1分钟（大失败时将永久耳聋）。

Boiling Blood.name: 沸腾之血 Boiling Blood
Boiling Blood.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:48]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 @Damage[6d8[fire]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[6d10[fire]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[6d12[fire]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 3}（1轮）

Furious Frenzy.name: 盛怒癫狂 Furious Frenzy
Furious Frenzy.description: 法夫尼尔以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击与一次颚咬，角抵或尾扫打击。

Cracked Earth.disable: @Check[survival|dc:16] (untrained) to collapse safely; @Check[crafting|dc:20] (trained) to shore it up enough to pass over without collapsing it
Cracked Earth.hazarddescription: This 20-foot-by-20-foot patch of ground is cobwebbed with cracks and fissures that crumble when a creature steps on it.
Cracked Earth.name: Cracked Earth

Long Fall.name: Long Fall
Long Fall.description:
Trigger A creature steps onto the cracked earth

Effect The creature fractures the thin crust of earth and falls through. That creature can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge} reaction to avoid falling, as long as it is adjacent to an edge. Otherwise it takes falling damage (typically @Damage[25[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage for a 50-foot drop). Some of these rifts eventually lead to the Darklands.

Twin Defenders.name: Twin Defenders
Twin Defenders.description: The Quantium golems were created by Nex as a matched set: one of crimson and one of emerald, each a unique entity. The crimson golem is imbued with blazing fire and crackling lightning; its eye beam and Lambent Beam abilities deal fire and electricity damage. The emerald golem is charged with caustic power and flame; its eye beam and Lambent Beam abilities deal acid and fire damage.

Defender's Link.name: Defender's Link
Defender's Link.description: Each Quantium golem automatically knows the Hit Points, conditions, afflictions, and location of the other.

Golem Antimagic.name: Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
Harmed by sonic (@Damage[9d10[untyped]], @Damage[3d10[untyped]] from areas or persistent damage); healed by fire (area @Damage[3d10[healing]] HP); slowed by cold

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.GolemAntimagic]

Paired Reconstruction.name: Paired Reconstruction
Paired Reconstruction.description: When reduced to 0 HP, the Quantium golem is destroyed; however, it magically reforms 24 hours later at full HP and free of all conditions and afflictions unless its twin golem is also destroyed.

Vulnerable to Banishment.name: Vulnerable to Banishment
Vulnerable to Banishment.description: Casting a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{Banishment} spell on a Quantium golem disrupts its connection to the Crux of Nex. If targeted by such a spell, the golem is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Lambent Beam.name: Lambent Beam
Lambent Beam.description: The Quantium golem's eyes take on a brilliant glow and it unleashes an arc of destruction dealing @Damage[10d6[fire],10d6[electricity]]{10d6 fire damage and 10d6 electricity damage} to creatures in a @Template[line|distance:120] (@Check[reflex|dc:42|basic]). The Quantium golem can't use Lambent Beam for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Lambent Beam]]{1d4 rounds}.

Quantium Golem (Electricity).name: Quantium Golem (Electricity)
Quantium Golem (Electricity).publicNotes:
The long war between Nex and Geb spawned many animate weapons, but while a citizen of Quantium might run screaming from any product of the fleshforges, they barely bat an eyelash at the ground-shaking stomp of the two titanic, deadly constructs that stride outside their city walls. Crafted by the wizard-king Nex ages ago after a devastating attack by Geb's undead forces, including the harrowing benthic reaver, the Quantium golems are meant to protect the capital in case of Nex's absence. These twin golems ceaselessly keep vigil over the city, ready to cut down any invaders that menace Quantium.

Twenty feet tall and crafted from a supernaturally smooth material, the two guardians are a matched set, one of crimson and one of emerald. Wielding swords the size of giants, the guardians relentlessly destroy anything that threatens the city, particularly any undead that might invade the country from Geb. With the mythic Crux of Nex as a power supply, the golems are inexhaustible and nearly indestructible.

Deep Breath.name: Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: The maliadi can hold its breath for 1 day.

Capsize.name: Capsize
Capsize.description:
The maliadi tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller.

The maliadi must succeed at a @Check[athletics|dc:35] check (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the maliadi) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The maliadi can take on the appearance of any Large, Huge, or Gargantuan animal. This doesn't change its Speed or Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

River Form.name: River Form
River Form.description: The maliadi takes on the form of a stretch of river, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.U0hL0LLaprcnAyzC]{Migration}, except the maliadi can only affect itself, appears as a section of a flowing river that takes up the same space as the maliadi, and can't leave the ground.

Collar of Fire.name: Collar of Fire
Collar of Fire.description:
The maliadi has resistance 20 to physical ranged attacks, such as arrows, bolts, javelins, and thrown rocks, as such attacks are magically diverted through its collar of fire.

Nonmagical weapons and ammunition affected by this ability are incinerated and destroyed.

Counterspelling Wall.name: Counterspelling Wall
Counterspelling Wall.description:
Trigger A creature within 100 feet of the maliadi that the maliadi can see Casts a Spell that targets the maliadi

Effect The maliadi casts one of its innate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{Wall of Fire} spells, with a duration of 1 round.

If the spell that triggered this reaction passes through the wall of fire, the wall attempts to counteract it, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+28]]{+28}.

Maliadi.name: Maliadi
Maliadi.publicNotes: A maliadi resembles a massive hippopotamus surrounded by a collar of flame. Maliadis are arrogant and tyrannical, and demand tribute from everyone they encounter-whether lone travelers or entire villages-to avert destruction. Many pay them off, for maliadis can hurl parts of their flaming collars to form geysers of flame or fiery walls, and they're also powerful shapeshifters.

Artificer's Command.name: 工匠之令 Artificer's Command
Artificer's Command.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 尤利斯图尔指挥一个60尺内的构装体，该构装体的等级必须低于她，且能感知到她。构装体获得能让自身性能提升的指令。该构装体的攻击骰、伤害骰和豁免检定获得+1状态加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.FjcvJWPFwkyy5vEk]

Statuesense.name: 雕像感知 Statuesense
Statuesense.description: 尤利斯图尔为自己制造了一些组件，增强了自身感官，她可以侦测其他构装体或类似物品的位置。她可以意识到所列范围内任何构装体或非活化雕像的存在。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Effects Creat.name: 对抗任何构装体制造的效果时全豁免+2状态加值

Artificer's Eye.name: 工匠之眼 Artificer's Eye
Artificer's Eye.description: 尤利斯图尔选择一个她能用精准感官（一般来说是视觉）或雕像感知观察到的构装体或雕像。选好目标后，她开始观察目标的周遭环境，就如她正位于目标所在的方格。如果目标是一个未活化的雕像或一个无心智生物，她还能与附近的生物进行言语沟通（包括使用工匠之令），或者让目标轻微移动（比如动动嘴）。只要尤利斯图尔能感知到目标，此能力可以无限维持，不过与此同时处理自身的视觉信号变得更为困难；在工匠之眼持续期间，她在使用自己身体的感官时被视为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]。

Dismantler.name: 拆解者 Dismantler
Dismantler.description: 尤利斯图尔针对构装体或物品的打击获得致命d12特征，并且忽略最多目标10点硬度或抗力。

Ivory Dictum.name: 象牙格言 Ivory Dictum
Ivory Dictum.description: 尤利斯图尔控制30尺内的一个构装体。这具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]（@Check[will|dc:32]豁免）的效果，但可以影响无心智生物，并且忽略可能的魔像抗魔能力。

Ulistul.name: 尤利斯图尔 Ulistul
Ulistul.allSaves: 对抗任何构装体制造的效果时全豁免+2状态加值

Outsmart.description:
Trigger A creature attacks while the ratajin mastermind is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}

Effect Due to planning, the ratajin mastermind can react quickly to poor situations. The ratajin mastermind isn't treated as off-guard to the attack, and the triggering creature is off-guard to the next attack made before the end of the ratajin mastermind's next turn.
Outsmart.name: Outsmart

Ratajin Mastermind.name: Ratajin Mastermind
Ratajin Mastermind.publicNotes:
Most commonly found in Vudra and Jalmeray, ratajin aren't so much twisted by curses as they are molded by the lingering effects of curses inflicted on generations millennia past. The difference lies in understanding the original ratajin characteristics. No curse gave ratajin four eyes on a slender face, nor triple-jointed, hypermobile legs and multiple arms. Nor did curses provide ratajin with skin tones of all hues within the color spectrum. Instead, these residual curses have given each ratajin distinctive geometric markings all across their body. Every ratajin also experiences a cursed twist on their senses, altering how they view and interact with the world around them. Some ratajin visualize the world in shifted, indescribable color spectra. For others, sounds physically manifest as feelings on their skin. Haunting melodies of past actions might whisper in the wind behind one ratajin, while another can be awake only during hours devoid of sunlight.

While particular curse manifestations are passed along family lines, each ratajin's worldview can offer a unique perspective. Ratajin tend to be receptive to new ideas, making them well-suited to tackle complex situations. They often prefer to focus on difficult problems, working without rest until they reach a solution. What satisfies the definition of a worthy pursuit varies with individual ratajin, from tinkering with new applications of technology to uncovering secrets of centuries-old magical tomes.
